Articles.Content:
[ Voiced By Jebediah Kerman ; In The Style Of The Old Spice Commercial With Isaiah Mustafa]

(((NO COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT INTENDED)))

Hello Kerbonauts

Look at your spacecraft

Now look at mine.

Now back to your spacecraft

NOW BACK to mine

Sadly, it isn't mine, but if you stopped using ASAS and switched to MechJeb it could be like mine.

Look at retrograde, now back to prograde.

Where are you? You're in space fighting off hunger landing on the Mun in the spacecraft

your spacecraft could be like.

What's in your hand? back to me. I have it, it's a Mun rock with 3 tickets to Kerbin. Look again,

The rock is now a rover.

Anything is possible with MechJeb.

Fly like a Pro, Pro! MechJeb.
